select ni.id, ni.content, ni.status, ni.user_id, ni.agency_type, ni.create_date, ni.finish_date, ni.del_flag,
si.code as supplierCode, si.name as supplierName, si.charge_person, si.phone, si.images as supplierImages from notify_info ni left join supplier_info si on (si.id = ai.user_id ) where 1 = 1 AND ni.del_flag = 0 AND ai.agency_type = '1'
AND si.name like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.supplierName},"%")
AND ni.status = #{queryForm.status}
order by ni.create_date desc

select ni.id, ni.content, ni.status, ni.user_id, ni.agency_type, ni.create_date, ni.finish_date, ni.del_flag,
si.code as staffCode, si.name as staffName, si.phone, si.images as staffImages from notify_info ni left join staff_info si on (si.id = ai.user_id ) where 1 = 1 AND ni.del_flag = 0 AND ai.agency_type = '2'
AND si.name like CONCAT("%",#{queryForm.staffName},"%")
AND ni.status = #{queryForm.status}
order by ni.create_date desc
